description: Trey Casteel and Peter Axel know how men play: rough and nasty.Spit, punches, slaps, and brutal fucking are how these big men workit. They even work in a fat dildo for good measure! Trey and Peter areperfect matches for each other; both huge mounds of solid musclewho want nothing more than to rip into one another. Working eachother over, they are not afraid of the pain or the pleasure each onedelivers. They get lost in plenty of mutual rimming and Trey takes abrutal fuck from Peter. But they better watch out for the swordshanging from the ceiling! JD Slater definitely knows how to keep hismodels in line, right down to his cutting edge sets!
title: Hunter Hunted, Scene #06
